summary: A strong-willed female stock car driver challenges her chauvinistic crush to a race to win his respect- and get him into bed.
cast: Betsy Russell|Gerard Christopher|Kristi Somers|Richard Erdman|Philip Sterling|Eric Douglas|Paul Gunning|Toby Iland|E. Danny Murphy|Rory Barish|Cynthia Thompson|Cory Hawkins|Shane McCabe|Aaron Butler|Dennis Hayden|Danna Garen|Alicia Hollinger|Carey Shearer|Jacqueline Jacobs|Michelle Bauer|Brian Jennings
title: Tomboy
